name: Smartwool Larimer Crew Socks - Unisex
description: These aren't your Grandpa's itchy ragg wool socks. Smartwool swapped out the classic wool Donegal textured yarn for a merino wool version that soft, breathes and will never itch. Sounds like Grandpa missed out.Textured Donegal yarn is made of soft merino wool, nylon and elastane for some stretch.Medium cushioning provies impact absorption for long days on your feet.Designed for durability in high-wear areas.
